elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for email address in the subscription popup.

elements.name: Claim offer Button
elements.description: Button to claim the offer in the subscription popup.

elements.name: Subscription Popup Close Button

elements.name: Exclusive Offer Banner Close Button

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This is the homepage of Dyson India's official website. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product details page.

elements.name: Vacuum & Wet Cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners product category page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones product category page.

elements.name: Dyson Logo
elements.description: Dyson logo that usually navigates to the homepage.

assertions: Page title contains 'Dyson India Official Website'
Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible

ProductsPage.description: This page allows the user to select items to add to their Dyson OnTrac bundle.

elements.name: OnTrac ear cushions (Khaki)
elements.description: The OnTrac ear cushions product.

elements.name: OnTrac outer caps (CNC Copper)
elements.description: The OnTrac outer caps product.

elements.name: Continue to basket (top)
elements.description: Button to continue to the basket from the top of the page.

elements.name: Continue to basket (bottom)
elements.description: Button to continue to the basket from the bottom of the page.

CartPage.description: This is the homepage of Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase products and promotions.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Cart Icon
elements.description: Link to the shopping cart page.

elements.name: Shop Now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Close Promotion
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.'
Page contains the element 'Search products and parts'

CheckoutPage.description: This page represents the checkout page of the Dyson India website, where users can review their basket and proceed to payment.

elements.name: Continue Shopping Link
elements.description: Link to navigate back to the product listing or homepage.

elements.name: Product Quantity Increment Button
elements.description: Button to increase the quantity of a product in the basket.

elements.name: Product Quantity Decrement Button
elements.description: Button to decrease the quantity of a product in the basket.

elements.name: Continue to checkout Button
elements.description: Button to proceed to the next step of the checkout process.

elements.name: Promotional Code Accordion
elements.primary_locator: text=Have you got a promotional code?
elements.description: Accordion to enter a promotional code.

elements.name: Remove Item from Basket
elements.description: Button to remove an item from the basket.

assertions: Continue to checkout button is visible

UnknownPage.description: This page is the first step of the checkout process, where the user enters their personal details such as email, phone number, first name, last name, and GST number.

elements.name: Email Address Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the user's email address.

elements.name: Phone Number Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the user's phone number.

elements.name: First Name Input
elements.backup_locator: input[placeholder='First Name (or Company name for business orders)']
elements.description: Input field for entering the user's first name.

elements.name: Last Name Input
elements.backup_locator: input[placeholder='Last Name (or Company name for business orders)']
elements.description: Input field for entering the user's last name.

elements.name: GST Number Input
elements.description: Input field for entering the user's GST number.

elements.name: Receive Information Checkbox
elements.backup_locator: I'd like to receive information on how to get the best out of my machine, updates and offers from Dyson.
elements.description: Checkbox to subscribe to receive information from Dyson.

elements.name: Edit Order Button
elements.description: Button to edit the order details.
